"How do I feel about fighting creatures other than Darkers? I have given some thought to that in the past."
"Having thought about it, I believe I can give a clear explanation of my beliefs."
"As you know, if you kill a Darker with anything other than a Photon-based attack, its essence remains and drives nearby lifeforms berserk."
"And without exception, these berserk lifeforms seek out ARKS to attack, just as Darkers do."
"Only we ARKS have the ability to manipulate Photons, and so only we can completely eradicate Darkers."

"So though it might weigh on one's conscience, it is something that has to be done.
...No matter how hard it is."
"To be honest, the revival of Dark Falz was completely unexpected."
"It may be that I retired too early."

"The Darkers are tough, but we ARKS are always growing stronger. We have no reason to fear them."

"The Darkers are tough, but we ARKS are always growing stronger. We have no reason to fear them."
"It may be that ARKS's rapid evolution only occurred as it did because we were in that madman's hands."
"However, meddling with souls is an act of pure evil. He crossed a line, and you did well to stop him."
"There will be great changes in our future. I cannot say what will happen, but I believe they will be changes in the right direction."
"The number of Darkers is increasing, and our enemies grow stronger by the day."
"But do not be hasty to lament our demise. We ARKS have evolved in the same way, and our strength has increased to match theirs."
"ARKS is changing for the better. With the danger behind us gone, we may give all our attention to the front."
"We face our toughest battle yet. But for some reason, I find I am not worried."
"We ARKS are finally united. We have total transparency from above, and our morale has never been higher."
"Nothing remains that can make me nervous. I believe we will be alright."
"It may seem trivial, but you would be surprised how often the deciding factor is the mental one."
"As long as you never give up on your dreams, nothing is impossible. The more difficult it seems, the more important your resolve will be."
"So decide what you want to do, and stick to it. Do not fail."
"I believe you achieved this result because you wanted it more than anyone else."

"The once-scattered ARKS are at last united...
It is truly a wonderful thing to see."
"Your influence is immeasurable. I expect even greater things from you in the future."

"There is little need for words between us. So...
Welcome back."

"I have been seeing strange ARKS about lately. Something is wrong...
I feel ill at ease."

"It could be their body language, perhaps something less tangible...
There is just something strange about them."
"I like the way that Summoners fight. Battling enemies alongside your Pets is commendable."
"I'm always glad to have an ally beside myself on the battlefield."
"Recently, I have been making an effort to be more strict with my pupils."
"It will benefit them in the future, and so it will benefit ARKS."
"With the appearance of these unexpectedly powerful enemies, morale has grown very low."
"But I'm sure you understand the importance of maintaining our composure at a time like this, so that we can soberly assess our situation."
"The more our enemies show their strength, the more they reveal their vulnerabilities."
"...We are in a difficult situation, and if we do not plan to target our enemy's weaknesses, we will not be able to escape it."
"Nobody could have blamed you for giving up, and yet you did not."
"That resolve has borne fruit. The worm is on the cusp of turning."
"No matter the situation, you always look to the future."
"Seeing you do so, everyone else turns their gaze the same way. I am proud of you."
"Congratulations on your safe return. That was truly an amazing victory."
"Your bonds with your allies, and your steadfast resolve that remained unyielding to the end, are what brought that miracle about."
